ABOUT ME

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do..

my opinion

In my journey to become advenced fullstack developer i had to pass through alot of issues,the most complicated part its actually find the first job that will agree to "accept" you because you dont have practical experience something that not so acceptable these days but i have no doubt that this issues will be provide soon cause the industrial is changing and far more i believe that hard work and hands on experience more important than any kind of degree.

udemy

podcasts
